title: How to write a thank you letter that is heartfelt - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want it to be heartfelt then you can’t ask someone what to say. You can’t use another person’s words because then it’s not coming from your heart. Put a pen to paper and start writing how it made you feel. It’s as easy as that. If you need to offer a disclaimer that you aren’t very good with the written word, add that. If it’s someone who cares about you, they’ll love it, regardless of what you write.
There’s really no right or wrong way to make it heartfelt. Write down what you feel, and if the person really knows you, they’ll greatly appreciate it
